model
Class Graph<NodeType extends INode<NodeType>>

java.lang.Object
  model.Graph<NodeType>
Type Parameters:
NodeType - the class of a node in the graph
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGraph<NodeType>, IModifiableGraph<NodeType>
public class Graph<NodeType extends INode<NodeType>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IModifiableGraph<NodeType>

A graph implementation that provides a merge operation to merge another graph into it. The graph can be modified by adding nodes to it. Whether edges can be added depends on the capability of the NodeType class.

Author:
sigurd

addInitial

public void addInitial(NodeType initialNode,
                       java.lang.String relation)
Description copied from interface: IModifiableGraph
Mark initialNode as initial with respect to relation. Implementations should make sure that initialNode is in fact a node of the graph.

Specified by:

Parameters:
